Bash(PGPASSWORD=2147483647 psql -h localhost -U postgres -d erp_db -c "SELECT c.id, c.name, c.email, COUNT(so.id) as order_count FROM customers c LEFT JOIN sales_orders so ON c.id = so.customer_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.email HAVING COUNT(so.id) > 0 LIMIT 1;")
